configuratorUpdateNotice.message:
您正在使用旧版本的 Rotorflight配置程序。
$t(configuratorUpdateHelp.message)
configuratorUpdateNotice.english:
You are using an outdated version of the Rotorflight Configurator.
$t(configuratorUpdateHelp.message)

configuratorUpdateHelp.message:
在旧版本的配置程序上使用新版本固件可能会使修改某些设置时导致 固件配置损坏且直升机无法工作。此外，固件的某些功能将仅能在 CLI 中配置。
Rotorflight 配置程序版本$1 可下载，请访问这个页面下载并安装最新的配置程序，以获取全部的修复与改进。
更新前请关闭配置程序窗口。
configuratorUpdateHelp.english:
Using a newer version of the firmware with an outdated version of Configurator means that changing some settings will result in a corrupted firmware configuration and a non-working craft. Furthermore, some features of the firmware will only be configurable in CLI.
Rotorflight Configurator version $1 is available for download online, please visit this page to download and install the latest version with fixes and improvements.
Please close the configurator window before updating.

backupFileUnmigratable.english: Backup file provided was generated by a previous version of the configurator and is not migratable. Sorry.

reportProblemsDialogACC_NEEDS_CALIBRATIO.message:
加速度计已启用，但未进行校准。
如果您打算使用加速度计，请遵循 "$t(tabSetup.message)" 页面中的 "$t(initialSetupButtonCalibrateAccel.message)" 操作指南。如果开启了任何需要调用加速度计的功能 (例如自稳模式, GPS 救援, …)，在加速度计完成校准之间将无法解锁。

reportProblemsDialogACC_NEEDS_CALIBRATIO.english:

If you plan to use the accelerometer, please follow the instructions for '$t(initialSetupButtonCalibrateAccel.message)' on the '$t(tabSetup.message)' tab. If any function that requires the accelerometer (auto level modes, GPS rescue, ...) is enabled, arming of the craft will be disabled until the accelerometer has been calibrated.
If you are not planning on using the accelerometer it is recommended that you disable it in '$t(configurationSystem.message)' on the '$t(tabConfiguration.message)' tab.

defaultWelcomeIntro.message: 欢迎使用 Rotorflight - 配置程序，为简化固件升级，设置和调校飞控而生的工具。
defaultWelcomeIntro.english: Welcome to Rotorflight - Configurator, a utility designed to simplify updating, configuring and tuning of your flight controller.

defaultWelcomeText.message:
本应用支持所有能运行 Rotorflight 的飞控。在 “固件烧写” 页面查看所有支持的飞控列表。
下载 Rotorflight Blackbox 日志查看工具。
下载 Rotorflight TX Lua 脚本。
下载 Rotorflight 固件 & 源码。
下载 STM USB VCP 驱动。
下载 Windows USB 驱动安装 Zadig 软件。
defaultWelcomeText.english:
The application supports all hardware that can run Rotorflight. Check flash tab for full list of hardware.

Download Rotorflight Blackbox Log Viewer

Download Rotorflight TX LUA Scripts

The source code can be downloaded from here

The latest STM USB VCP Drivers can be downloaded from here
The latest Zadig for Windows USB driver installer can be downloaded from here

defaultContributingText.message:
如果你想帮助 Rotorflight 变得更好，你可以：
  • 用您的 Rotorflight 知识来为我们的 Wiki 创建或更新内容，或者是在论坛里回答其他用户的问题；
  • 贡献代码 - 增加新功能，解决漏洞，改善代码；
  • 测试新功能并提供测试反馈；
  • 帮助在问题跟踪器里上报告问题的用户解决问题，并参与功能请求的讨论；
  • 翻译 - 为 Rotorflight 配置软件添加新语言的翻译，或者帮助维护既有的翻译。
defaultContributingText.english:
If you would like to help make Rotorflight even better you can help in many ways, including:
  • using your knowledge of Rotorflight to create or update content on our Wiki, or answering other users' questions in online forums;
  • contributing to the firmware and the configurator - new features, fixes, improvements;
  • testing new features and fixes and providing feedback;
  • helping other users solve the problems they report in our issue tracker, and participating in discussions on feature requests;
  • translating Rotorflight Configurator into a new language, or helping to maintain the existing translations.

patreonLink.description: Patreon is name, and should not require translation

configurationAccelTrimsHelp.english: The Accelerometer Trims provide fine tuning to the accel calibration to remove drift while in stabilized modes, such as Horizon, Angle and Rescue.

escProtocolDisabledMessage.message: 注意： 若选择不被您的电调所支持的电调协议将导致连接电池后电调会立刻驱动电机旋转。出于这个原因，在更改电调协议后，连接电池之前，请确保您的螺旋桨已被卸下！
escProtocolDisabledMessage.english: Caution: Selecting a motor output protocol that is not supported by your ESCs can lead to the ESCs spinning up as soon as a battery is connected. For this reason, always make sure to remove the props before connecting a battery for the first time after changing the motor output protocol.

configurationDshotBeaconHelp.message:
Dshot 信标使用电调和电机产生声音。这意味着当电机旋转时，Dshot 信标无法工作。在 Betaflight 3.4 和以后的版本中，若在 Dshot 信标激活时尝试解锁，飞控会在发出最后一声信标音后延迟2秒再解锁。这是为了防止 Dshot 信标功能干扰在解锁时发送的 Dshot 命令。
警告： 由于 Dshot 信标会有电流通过，如果信标鸣叫强度设置得太高，可能会造成电机/电调过热甚至损毁。建议使用 BLHeli 配置程序或 BLHeliSuite 来调整和测试信标的鸣叫强度。
configurationDshotBeaconHelp.english:
The Dshot beacon uses the ESCs and motors to produce sound. This means that the Dshot beacon cannot be used when the motors are spinning. In Betaflight 3.4 and newer, when arming is attempted while the Dshot beacon is active, there is a 2 second delay after the last Dshot beacon tone before the craft is armed. This is to prevent the Dshot beacon functionality from interfering with the Dshot commands sent when arming.
Warning: Since the Dshot beacon is running current through your motors when active, this can result in excessive heat production and damage to your motors and / or ESCs if the beacon strength is set too high. Use BLHeli Configurator or the BLHeli Suite to adjust and test the beacon strength.

profilesProportionalHelp.message:
控制直升机紧跟摇杆的力度（设定点）。

较高的值（增益）可提供更紧密的跟踪，但如果与微分（D 项）的比例过高，则可能导致过冲。 将 P 项想象成汽车上的弹簧。
profilesProportionalHelp.english:
Controls the strength of how tightly the machine tracks the sticks (the Setpoint).

Higher value (gains) provide tighter tracking, but can cause overshoot if too high in proportion to the Derivative (D-term). Think of the P-term as the spring on a car.
profilesProportionalHelp.description: Proportional Term helpicon message on PID table titlebar

profilesIntegralHelp.message:
控制直升机保持设定点整体位置的力度。
与 P项类似，但适用于较长的飞行偏差，如重心偏移（CoG）或持续的外部影响（稳定的风）。

增益越大，跟踪越紧密（例如：在急转弯时），但会使直升机在指令摇杆输入时感觉僵硬。
如果与 D 项的比例极高，则会导致缓慢振荡。
profilesIntegralHelp.english:
Controls the strength of how tightly the machine holds the overall position of the Setpoint.
Similar to Proportional, but for longer biases on the craft such as an offset center of gravity (CoG) or persistent outside influence (steady wind).

Higher gains provide tighter tracking (e.g.: in sweeping turns), but can make the craft feel stiff for commanded stick inputs.
If extremely high in proportion to the D-term, can cause slow oscillations.
profilesIntegralHelp.description: Integral Term helpicon message on PID table titlebar

profilesDerivativeHelp.message:
控制直升机上任何运动的阻尼强度。对于摇杆移动，D 项会抑制指令。对于外部影响（螺旋桨冲刷或阵风），D 项会抑制影响。

增益越高，阻尼越大，P 项和 FF 的过冲越小。
不过，D项对陀螺仪的高频振动非常敏感（噪声放大 10 倍到 100 倍）。

把 D 项想象成汽车上的减震器，但它有放大高频陀螺噪音的负面固有特性。
profilesDerivativeHelp.english:
Controls the strength of dampening to ANY motion on the craft. For stick moves, the D-term dampens the command. For an outside influence (prop-wash OR wind gust) the D-term dampens the influence.

Higher gains provide more dampening and reduce overshoot by P-term and FF.
However, the D-term is VERY sensitive to gyro high frequency vibrations (noise | magnifies by 10x to 100x).

High frequency noise can cause motor heat and burn out motors if D-gains are too high or the gyro noise is not filtered well (see Filters tab).

Think of the D-term as the shock absorber on your car, but with the negative inherent property of magnifying high frequency gyro noise.
profilesDerivativeHelp.description: Derivative Term helpicon message on PID table titlebar

profilesFeedforwardHelp.message:
是基于摇杆输入的附加推动项（弹簧）。FF 可帮助 P 项推动直升机进行指令摇杆移动。

P 项根据指令设定点（度/秒）和陀螺仪读数（度/秒）之间的差值进行推动。FF 仅根据摇杆的指令变化进行推动。

数值（增益）越高，对摇杆输入的响应越灵敏。过高的值可能会导致过冲、电机发热增加和电机过载（电机无法跟上所需的变化率）。
数值越小或为零（0），对摇杆输入的响应越慢、越平滑。
profilesFeedforwardHelp.english:
Is an additional pushing term (spring) based on stick input. FF helps the P-term push the craft for commanded stick moves.

The P-term pushes based on the difference between the commanded Setpoint (deg/sec) and the gyro reading of current rotational rate (deg/sec). FF pushes based on the commanded change of the sticks alone.

Higher values (gains) will result in a more sharp machine response to stick input.
Too high of values may result in some overshoot, increased motor heat, and motor saturation (where motors can not keep up with the desired rate of change).
Lower or zero (0) values will result in a slower and smoother response to stick inputs.
profilesFeedforwardHelp.description: Feedforward Term helpicon message on PID table titlebar

profilesBoostHelp.message: 是对前馈的额外提升。这将使直升机对快速打杆做出更快的反应。
profilesBoostHelp.english: Is an additional boost on the feedforward. This makes the heli react faster to quick stick movements.

receiverHelpFullThrottle.english: The channel value (in µs) for the throttle channel to be considered 100%

receiverHelpCyclicDeadband.message: 这些值（单位为 µs）是 RC 输入在被视为非零之前的变化幅度。对于输出有抖动的遥控器，如果 RC 输入在空闲时跳动，该值可以增加。
receiverHelpCyclicDeadband.english: These are values (in µs) by how much RC input can be different before it's considered non-zero. For transmitters with jitter on outputs, this value can be increased if rc inputs twitch while idle.

receiverHelpYawDeadband.message: 这些值（单位为 µs）是 RC 输入在被视为非零之前的变化幅度。对于输出有抖动的遥控器，如果 RC 输入在空闲时跳动，该值可以增加。这个设置只对航向生效
receiverHelpYawDeadband.english: These are values (in µs) by how much RC input can be different before it's considered non-zero. For transmitters with jitter on outputs, this value can be increased if rc inputs twitch while idle. This setting is for Yaw only.

receiverButtonBindMessage.message: 对频请求已发送到飞行控制器。
receiverButtonBindMessage.english: Bind request sent to the flight controller.

receiverMspWarningText.message:
这些操纵杆允许在没有发射器或接收机的情况下解锁和测试直升机。但是，此功能不适用于飞行，并且不能装上桨叶。

此功能不能保证可靠地控制您的直升机。如果桨叶留在上面，可能会导致严重伤害。
receiverMspWarningText.english:
These sticks allow Rotorflight to be armed and tested without a transmitter or receiver being present. However, this feature is not intended for flight and rotor blades must not be attached.

This feature does not guarantee reliable control of your craft. Serious injury is likely to result if rotor blades are left on.

auxiliaryHelp.message:
在此处通过使用范围和/或链接到其他模式的组合配置飞行模式(BF4.0及更高版本支持链接) 。使用 范围 来定义遥控器上的开关和分配相应的模式。当接收机给出的通道值在最小/最大范围内将激活该模式。当一个模式被激活时，使用链接来激活另一个模式。例外: 解锁不能链接或者被链接到其他的模式，当一个模式已被链接则无法被再次链接(多重链接) 。多个范围/链接可以用于激活任何模式。如果为一个模式定义了多个范围/链接，则可以将每个范围/链接设置为和 或是 或。模式将在以下情况下被激活：
- 全部的和 范围/链接都激活; 或者是
- 至少有一个 或 范围/链接激活。

记得使用保存按钮来保存你的设置。
auxiliaryHelp.english:
Configure modes here using a combination of ranges and/or links to other modes (links supported on BF 4.0 and later). Use ranges to define the switches on your transmitter and corresponding mode assignments. A receiver channel that gives a reading between a range min/max will activate the mode. Use a link to activate a mode when another mode is activated. Exceptions: ARM cannot be linked to or from another mode, modes cannot be linked to other modes that are configured with a link (chained links). Multiple ranges/links can be used to activate any mode. If there is more than one range/link defined for a mode, each of them can be set to AND or OR. A mode will be activated when:
- ALL AND ranges/links are active; OR
- at least one OR range/link is active.

Remember to save your settings using the Save button.

adjustmentsHelp.message: 配置调整开关。详细信息请参阅手册中的“飞行中调整”章节。通过该调整功能所进行的更改将不会被自动保存。
adjustmentsHelp.english: Configure adjustment switches. See the 'in-flight adjustments' section of the manual for details. The changes that adjustment functions make are not saved automatically.

adjustmentSlotsHelp.message: 共有4个滑槽。同时进行调整时每个开关都需要配置专用滑槽。
adjustmentSlotsHelp.english: There are 4 slots. Each switch used to concurrently make adjustments requires exclusive use of a slot.

adjustmentsExample1.message: 使用AUX1通道上的三段开关在Pitch/Roll的 P, I 和 D 之间选择，使用AUX2通道的三段开关来上下增大和减小数值（拨高，或拨低）。
adjustmentsExample1.english: Use a three position switch on AUX1 to select between Pitch/Roll P, I and D and another three position switch on AUX2 to increase or decrease the value when held up or down.

adjustmentsExample2.message: 使用 AUX4 通道上的三段开关来选择 Rate 配置文件
adjustmentsExample2.english: Use a three position switch on AUX4 to select enable Rate Profile Selection via the same three position switch on the same channel.

then apply value from channel,

servoHelp.message:
舵机 101
  • 首先检查舵机的方向，必要时反转舵机。
  • 通过启用 舵机调试 和调整 中心点 来调平舵机臂。在此位置，舵机臂应与主轴垂直。
  • 调整标尺使舵机角度正确。在 舵机调试 下为舵机指定一个 30° 的角度。现在舵机应该移动到 30°。如果角度较小，则增加该舵机的 缩放 。如果角度较大，则减小。
  • 您可以通过调整 最小值 或 最大值 来限制或扩展舵机的移动范围。只有在出现机械问题（如舵机阻滞）时才会这样做。使用混控来限制副翼/升降/集体螺距。
servoHelp.english:
Servo 101
  • First check the servo directions. Check cyclic servos by giving some collective, for example. Reverse servos if needed.
  • Level the servo arms by enabling Servo Override and adjusting Center. The servo arms should be perpendicular to the main shaft in this position.
  • Adjust Scale so that servo angles are correct. Specify an angle of 30° for a servo under Servo Override. The servo should now move to 30°. If it's less, increase the Scale for that servo. If it's more, decrease it.
  • You can limit or extend the servo movement range by adjusting Min or Max. Do this only if there's a mechanical issue, like servo binding. Use the mixer to limit roll/pitch/collective.

servoMidHelp.message: 中心点的信号，在这个信号下，舵机臂应该是水平的
servoMidHelp.english: Center position in µs. Servo arms should be level in this position.

servoMinHelp.message: 最小脉冲宽度。较低的数值可以增加舵机行程。使用更高的值来避免舵机阻滞。
servoMinHelp.english: Minimum pulse width. Lower values can increase servo throw. Use higher values to avoid servo binding.

servoMaxHelp.message: 最大脉冲宽度。较高的数值可以增加舵机行程。使用更低的值来避免舵机阻滞。
servoMaxHelp.english: Maximum pulse width. Higher values can increase servo throw. Use lower values to avoid servo binding.

servoScaleNegHelp.message: 负方向的缩放比例(比中心点更低)，应该与正缩放大致相同。
servoScaleNegHelp.english: Scaling factor on negative side (below center level). Should be about the same as Scale pos.

servoScalePosHelp.message: 正方向的缩放比例(比中心点更高)，应该与负缩放大致相同。
servoScalePosHelp.english: Scaling factor on positive side (above center level). Should be approximately the same as Scale neg.

servoRateHelp.message:
PWM更新频率(Hz)。对于模拟舵机，这通常是50Hz。较高的数值会损坏模拟舵机。对于数字舵机，它可以从100Hz到560Hz变化。请检查你的舵机的数据表。
注意: 选择 保存并重新启动 以实际更改更新速率，因为更新速率只能在启动时设置。
servoRateHelp.english:
PWM update rate in Hz. For analog servos, this is usually 50Hz. Higher values can damage analog servos. For digital servos, it can vary from 100Hz to 560Hz. Please check your servo's data sheet.
Note: select Save and reboot to actually change the update rate, since the update rate can only be set at boot time.

servoSpeedHelp.message: Limits the motion speed of the servo. Can be used for e.g. retracts. A value of 0 means no limitation. Values between 1-60000 milliseconds specify the time needed to rotate the servo 60°.
servoSpeedHelp.english: Limits the motion speed of the servo. Can be used for e.g. retracts. A value of 0 means no limitation. Values between 1-60000 milliseconds specify the time needed to rotate the servo 60°.

previous.message: 限制舵机的运动速度。可用于回缩等情况。数值为 0 表示没有限制。1-60000 毫秒之间的数值表示伺服旋转 50 度所需的时间。
previous.english: Limits the motion speed of the servo. Can be used for e.g. retracts. A value of 0 means no limitation. Values between 1-60000 milliseconds specify the time needed to rotate the servo 50°.

servoReverseHelp.message: 反向 如果舵机没有按照预期的方向移动
servoReverseHelp.english: Reverse a servo if it's not moving in the right direction.

servoGeometryCorrectionHelp.message: 启用 几何校正用于校正舵机臂在旋转到高角度时的行程误差。请勿与线性伺服器一起使用。
servoGeometryCorrectionHelp.english: Enable Geo cor for correcting the rotational geometry. Do not use with linear servos.

servoRateRebootNote.message: 警告： 对舵机速率参数的更改需要重启系统后才能生效！

servoUnusualLimitsWarning.message: 舵机的 限制 设置为异常值。请检查！
servoUnusualLimitsWarning.english: Warning: The servo Limits are set to unusual values. Please check!

servoUnusualScalesWarning.message: 警告： 舵机的 缩放 设置为异常值。请检查！
servoUnusualScalesWarning.english: Warning: The servo Scales are set to unusual values. Please check!

servoUnusualRatesWarning.message: 警告： 舵机的 频率 设置为异常值。请检查！
servoUnusualRatesWarning.english: Warning: The servo Rates are set to unusual values. Please check!

servoUnusualGeometryCorrection.message: 警告： 舵机的 几何校正 设置为异常值。请检查！
servoUnusualGeometryCorrection.english: Warning: The Geometry correction is not equal for all servos. Please check!

servoOverrideHelp.message: 选中要调试的舵机，然后移动滑块，将舵机臂移动到指令角度。
servoOverrideHelp.english: Select the servo to be overridden and then move the slider to move the servo arm to the commanded angle.

servoEnableOverrideText.message: 舵机调试 将舵机强制设置到固定位置，以便进行调试。调试值不会保存，重启后将被重置。
servoEnableOverrideText.english: Servo override forces the servos to fixed positions for setup purposes. The override values are not saved, and will be reset after a reboot.

mixerCustomNote.message: 警告： 混控被配置为自定义配置 ，不能在配置器界面中显示。任何配置更改都必须在命令行中使用mixer命令完成。
mixerCustomNote.english: Warning: The Mixer is configured with a custom setup that can't be presented in the GUI. Any configuration changes must be done in the CLI, with the mixer command.

mixerRulesNote.message: 警告： 混控使用自定义配置进行设置，任何规则更改都需要在命令行中使用mixer rule进行配置
mixerRulesNote.english: Warning: The Mixer is configured with custom rules. Any rule changes must be done in the CLI, with the mixer rule command.

mixerBidirNote.english: Warning: Bidirectional tail motor is an experimental feature that requires additional settings in the CLI.

mixerRebootNote.message: 警告： 某些设置需要重启系统后才会生效！
mixerRebootNote.english: Warning: Some settings require System Reboot before taking affect!

mixerMainRotorDirectionHelp.message: 从直升机的顶部往下看，主旋翼以什么方向旋转？对于大多数直升机，它是顺时针旋转的
mixerMainRotorDirectionHelp.english: Looking from the top of the helicopter, what direction is the main rotor turning? For the majority of helicopters this is clockwise

mixerSwashTypeHelp.message:
选择斜盘类型
无： 混控将会关闭，需要在命令行中进行配置。
直通： 不进行混控，命令将会直接通过。
CCPM: 循环-集体螺距混控，适用于有三个斜盘舵机的直升机。
FPM: 固定螺距混控。 适用于配有两个斜盘舵机器的固定螺距直升机。
mixerSwashTypeHelp.english:
Select the swashplate type.
None: The mixer is turned off. Custom mixing rules must be set in the CLI.
Passthrough: No mixing, controls are passed through the mixer unchanged.
CCPM: Cyclic-Collective Pitch Mixing. For helicopters with three swashplate servos.
FPM: Fixed Pitch Mixing. For fixed-pitch helicopters with two swashplate servos.

mixerElevatorDirectionHelp.message: 根据升降舵机的位置和旋翼头的设计，方向可能会相反。
mixerElevatorDirectionHelp.english: Depending on the elevator servo position and the head design, the direction may be reversed.

mixerAileronDirectionHelp.message: 根据副翼舵机的位置和旋翼头的设计，方向可能会相反。
mixerAileronDirectionHelp.english: Depending on the aileron servo position and the head design, the direction may be reversed.

mixerCollectiveDirectionHelp.message: 取决于主桨夹控制臂的位置，集体螺距方向可以逆转。通常后缘控制是反向的。
mixerCollectiveDirectionHelp.english: Depending on the blade grip control arm position, the collective direction may be reversed. Usually trailing edge control has reversed direction.

mixerCyclicCalibrationHelp.message: 调整循环螺距增益，使其与旋翼头设计中的机械增益相匹配。
mixerCyclicCalibrationHelp.english: Adjust the cyclic gain to match the mechanical gain in the head design.

mixerCollectiveCalibrationHelp.message: 调整集体螺距增益，使其与旋翼头设计中的机械增益相匹配。
mixerCollectiveCalibrationHelp.english: Adjust the collective gain to match the mechanical gain in the head design.

mixerTotalPitchLimitHelp.message: 集体螺距+循环螺距的最大极限
mixerTotalPitchLimitHelp.english: Maximum amount of total cyclic + collective blade pitch.

mixerCyclicLimitHelp.message: 主旋翼的最大循环螺距限制
mixerCyclicLimitHelp.english: Maximum amount of cyclic blade pitch

mixerCollectiveLimitHelp.message: 主旋翼的最大集体螺距限制
mixerCollectiveLimitHelp.english: Maximum amount of collective blade pitch

mixerSwashRingHelp.message: 当升降角和副翼角均为最大值时，增加斜盘限制值将限制倾斜盘的最大角度。
mixerSwashRingHelp.english:
The swashring limits the maximum angle the swashplate can reach in order to prevent binding. Pitch and Roll axis should be configured individually (via the Mixer input and scaling) to the desired pitch angles (without binding). If however, both the maximum Pitch and Roll are commanded at the same time, the Swashplate will have to deflect to a larger angle than either axis individually. This may result in the swashplate binding on the main shaft.

Increasing the value of Swashring will limit the maximum Swashplate angle when both Pitch and Roll are maximum.

mixerSwashPhaseHelp.message: 倾斜盘控制的相位偏移。
mixerSwashPhaseHelp.english: The phase offset for the swashplate controls.

mixerSwashTrimHelp.message: 微调斜盘舵机连杆的功能，仅在连杆物理长度不可调时使用
mixerSwashTrimHelp.english: Trim for swashplate linkages. Use only if the linkages are not adjustable.

mixerTailRotorModeHelp.message:
可变螺距： 由一个舵机(舵机#4)驱动的可变螺距尾旋翼。
电机直驱: 由一个尾电机 (M2)驱动的尾旋翼。
双向电驱： 与电机直驱一样，但它工作在双向模式下。
mixerTailRotorModeHelp.english:
Variable pitch: This is a variable pitch tail controlled by a servo (Servo#4)
Motorised: The tail has a separate motor (M2) for controlling the yaw.
Bi-directional: Motorised tail operating in bi-directional mode.

mixerTailRotorDirectionHelp.message: 取决于尾旋翼方向和电调 / 舵机配置，航向方向是可调的。
mixerTailRotorDirectionHelp.english: Depending on the tail rotor direction and ESC/servo configuration, the yaw direction may be reversed.

mixerTailRotorCalibrationHelp.message: 调整航向增益以匹配机械增益。舵机驱动尾旋翼的比例通常在50-150%左右，但电机直驱尾旋翼的比例可能大不相同。
mixerTailRotorCalibrationHelp.english: Adjust the yaw gain to match the mechanical gain. Usually around 50-150% for servo driven tails, but can be wildly different for motorised tail rotors.

mixerTailRotorMinYawHelp.message: 顺时针航向的角度极限
mixerTailRotorMinYawHelp.english: An angle limit for clockwise yaw.

mixerTailRotorMaxYawHelp.message: 逆时针航向的角度极限
mixerTailRotorMaxYawHelp.english: An angle limit for counter-clockwise yaw.

mixerTailMotorMinYawHelp.message: 针对顺时针旋转的航向轴限制

mixerTailMotorMaxYawHelp.message: 针对逆时针旋转的航向轴限制

mixerTailMotorIdleHelp.message: 这是发送到尾电机的最小油门信号。这应该设置得足够高，电机才不会停止
mixerTailMotorIdleHelp.english: This is the minimum throttle signal sent to the tail motor. This should be set just high enough that the motor does not stop

mixerTailRotorCenterTrimHelp.message: 微调0度航向指令时的尾旋翼螺距。
mixerTailRotorCenterTrimHelp.english: Set tail rotor trim for zero yaw command.

mixerTailMotorCenterTrimHelp.message: 微调0度航向指令时的尾电机油门值。
mixerTailMotorCenterTrimHelp.english: Set tail motor throttle value for zero yaw command.

mixerInputChannelsHelp.message:
注意！这里是限制控制的正确位置

混合器输入率用于设置缩放比例，以匹配机械设置。由于每个旋翼头都不同，因此每个设置需要不同的缩放值。
控制 这一栏包含每个稳定控制功能。
最小值：设置指令下达时希望桨叶达到的最小角度。
最大值：设置指令下达时希望桨叶达到的最大角度。
缩放比例：增大或减小缩放值，直到直升机桨叶与指令角度一致。

混控输入校准流程
步骤1： 打开该页面上的混控调试功能开关。
步骤2： 在要校准的通道左侧打开开关。
步骤3： 将混音器覆盖设置为一个角度（例如 10 度）。
步骤4： 测量桨叶的实际角度。
步骤5： 设置缩放比例，使实际桨叶角度与指令角度一致。
mixerInputChannelsHelp.english:
Note! This is the right place to limit your controls

The mixer input rate is for setting the scaling factors to match the mechanical head setup. As every rotor head is different, different scaling values are needed for each setup.
Control: This column contains each of the Stabilized control functions.
Minimum: Set the minimum angle you wish the blade to reach when commanded.
Maximum: Set the maximum angle you wish the blade to reach when commanded.
Scaling: Increase or decrease the scaling value until the helicopter blades match the commanded angle.

Mixer Input Calibration Process
Step 1: Enable the mixer override by the selector on the 'SYSTEM' tab. The Mixer Override entry will now be visible on this page.
Step 2: Enable the bypass on the Control to be calibrated.
Step 3: Set the Mixer override to an angle (say 10 degrees).
Step 4: Measure the actual blade angle.
Step 5: Set the scaling so the physical blade angle matches the commanded angle.

mixerOverrideNote.message: 注意 混控调试功能可将混控输入强制设置到任意位置，以便进行调试校准。调试值不会保存，会在重启时重置。
mixerOverrideNote.english: Note. Mixer Override forces the mixer inputs to arbitrary positions for setup purposes. The override values are not saved, and will be reset in reboot.

mixerOverrideHelp.message: 该功能用于设置旋翼，是混控校准过程的一部分。当启用激活时，可直接将混控指令发送到所要求的位置。
mixerOverrideHelp.english: This feature is used for setting up the rotor and is part of the Mixer Calibration process. When the bypass enable is active the mixer can be commanded to the requested positions directly.

mixerOverrideEnableSwitchText.message: 混控调试功能可将混控输入强制设置到任意位置，以便进行校准。调试值不会保存，会在重启时重置。
mixerOverrideEnableSwitchText.english: Mixer Override forces the mixer inputs to arbitrary positions for setup purposes. The override values are not saved, and will be reset in reboot.

dialogMixerResetNote.message: 选择预设的斜盘类型会将任何自定义混控规则重置为默认值。
dialogMixerResetNote.english: Selecting a pre-defined Swashplate type will reset any custom Mixer rules to defaults.

motorsMotorPolesHelp.message: 极数是电机转子上磁铁的数量（非对数）。不计算定子上的绕组。大型电机通常有8个磁铁，较小的电机通常有6个磁铁。
motorsMotorPolesHelp.english: The pole count is the number of magnets on the bell of the motor. Do NOT count the stators where the windings are located. Large motors usually have 8 magnets, smaller often have 6 magnets.

motorsThrottleMinimumHelp.message: 这是在零油门时(直升机已解锁)发送到电调的 PWM 值。
motorsThrottleMinimumHelp.english: This is the PWM value that is sent to the ESCs at zero throttle (when the craft is armed).

motorsThrottleMaximumHelp.message: 这是在全油门时(直升机已解锁)发送到电调的 PWM 值。
motorsThrottleMaximumHelp.english: This is the PWM value that is sent to the ESCs at full throttle (when the craft is armed).

motorsThrottleMinimumCommandHelp.message: 当直升机上锁时，这是发送到电调的 PWM 值。将此设置为保持电机停止的值（对于大多数电调为1000）。
motorsThrottleMinimumCommandHelp.english: This is the PWM value that is sent to the ESCs when the craft is disarmed. Set this to a value that keep the motors stopped (1000 for most ESCs).

motorMainGearRatioIssueNote.message: 警告： 主旋翼齿比 设置为不正确的值。请检查!
motorMainGearRatioIssueNote.english: Warning: Main Rotor Gear Ratio is set to an incorrect value. Please check!

motorTailGearRatioIssueNote.message: 警告： 尾旋翼齿比设置为不正确的值。请检查!
motorTailGearRatioIssueNote.english: Warning: Tail Rotor Gear Ratio is set to an incorrect value. Please check!

motorOverrideNote.message:
注释 油门调试：出于设置和测试目的，将输出油门强制设置为任意值。覆盖值不会保存，会在重启时重置。

电机油门调试将使电机启动！
motorOverrideNote.english:
Note. Throttle Override forces the output throttle to an arbitrary value for setup and testing purposes. The override values are not saved, and will be reset in reboot.

MOTOR THROTTLE OVERRIDE WILL MAKE THE MOTORS TO SPOOL UP!

motorOverrideHelp.message: 通过开关选择调试，然后移动滑块开始控制电机。
motorOverrideHelp.english: Select the Override via the switch and then move the slider to begin to operate the motor.

escDshotDirectionDialog-Title.message: 电机方向 - 警告：确保螺旋桨已被移除！
escDshotDirectionDialog-Title.english: Motor Direction - Warning: Ensure props are removed!

escDshotDirectionDialog-SelectMotorSafet.message: 被选定后电机将会旋转！

escDshotDirectionDialog-RiskNotice.message:
安全提示
请拆除所有螺旋桨以免受伤！
点选电机将会立刻转动!
escDshotDirectionDialog-RiskNotice.english:
Safety notice
Remove all propellers to prevent injury!
The motors will spin up immediately when selected!

escDshotDirectionDialog-UnderstandRisks.message:
我已了解风险，
所有螺旋桨已拆除。
escDshotDirectionDialog-UnderstandRisks.english:
I understand the risks,
all propellers are removed.

escDshotDirectionDialog-InformationNotic.message:
信息提示：
若要更改电机转动方向， 必须接入电池，且必须在$t(tabMotors.message)中设置正确的电调协议。请注意，并非所有支持 Dshot 协议的 ESC 都能使用此对话框。请检查您的 ESC 固件。
escDshotDirectionDialog-InformationNotic.english:
Information notice
To change the motor directions, the battery must be plugged in and the correct ESC protocol must be set up in the $t(tabMotors.message) tab. Note that not all Dshot ESCs will work with this dialog. Check your ESC firmware.

escDshotDirectionDialog-NormalInformatio.message: 通过单独选择并旋转电机来设置电机旋转方向。
escDshotDirectionDialog-NormalInformatio.english: Set motor spin direction by selecting and spinning each motor individually.

escDshotDirectionDialog-WizardInformatio.message: 重置所有电机的旋转方向，然后允许用户选择电机以反转。
escDshotDirectionDialog-WizardInformatio.english: Resets all motor spin directions, then allows the user to choose which to reverse.

escDshotDirectionDialog-SetDirectionHint.message: 在设置转向时电机将会旋转！
escDshotDirectionDialog-SetDirectionHint.english: Motors will spin when setting the direction!

escDshotDirectionDialog-WrongProtocolTex.message:
该功能只适用于 DSHOT 电调。
Verify that your ESC (electric speed controller) supports DSHOT protocol and change it on $t(tabMotors.message) tab.
escDshotDirectionDialog-WrongProtocolTex.english:
Feature works with DSHOT ESCs only.
Verify that your ESC (electric speed controller) supports DSHOT protocol and change it on $t(tabMotors.message) tab.

escDshotDirectionDialog-WrongMixerText.message:
电机数为0。
在 $t(tabMotors.message) 页面内检查当前混控器或通过 CLI 设置一个自定义混控器。参见此 Wiki page.
escDshotDirectionDialog-WrongMixerText.english:
Number of motors is 0.
Verify the current Mixer on $t(tabMotors.message) tab or setup a custom one through CLI. Refer to this Wiki page.

escDshotDirectionDialog-WrongFirmwareTex.message:
更新固件。
请确保您正在使用最新的固件：Betaflight 4.3或更高版本。
escDshotDirectionDialog-WrongFirmwareTex.english:
Update the firmware.
Make sure you are using the latest firmware: Betaflight 4.3 or newer.

escDshotDirectionDialog-WizardActionHint.message: 单独点击电机标号以改变旋转方向
escDshotDirectionDialog-WizardActionHint.english: Click on motor numbers individually to change spin direction

escDshotDirectionDialog-WizardActionHint.message: 验证所有电机旋转正确
escDshotDirectionDialog-WizardActionHint.english: Verify all motors are spinning correctly

govFeaturesHelp.message: 定速功能将会使用动态油门控制直升机在不同负载下仍然维持恒定的主旋翼转速，从而提供持续稳定的飞行能力。

govConfigurationNote.message: 注意：定速器具有全局参数与飞行配置参数。请参阅飞行参数选项卡的飞行参数具体参数。
govConfigurationNote.english: Note: Governor has both global and profile parameters. Please see the Profiles tab for profile specific parameters.

govModeHelp.message:
定速器将会保持主旋翼的转速恒定
关: 定速器禁用
直通： 调速器不控制转速，但提供缓启动与自转保护的功能
标准： 飞控以电调转速为参考控制电机转速。
模式1： 基于标准，但会有额外的集体/循环螺距的预补偿（例如，在大幅度的螺距增加时，飞控会增加到电调的信号值，以便电机转速不会因为负载增加而下降）
模式2：基于模式2，但有电池电压补偿。
govModeHelp.english:
The governor maintains the main rotor speed constant.
OFF: Govenor is disabled
PASSTHROUGH: Only slow spoolup and autorotation bailout
STANDARD: Motor speed is controlled by the FC and speed reference from the ESC.
MODE1: As per statndard but with Collective and Cyclic Precompensation (e.g. for a large increase collective the FC increases the signal sent to the ESC so the motor speed does not sag due to the increased load).
MODE2: as per Mode 1 but also Battery voltage compensation

govStartupTimeHelp.message: 未检测到有效转速时的缓启动的时间常数，以秒为单位，测量主旋翼从零到全速的时间。
govStartupTimeHelp.english: Time constant for slow startup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.

govSpoolupTimeHelp.message: 检测到有效转速时的缓启动的时间常数，以秒为单位，测量主旋翼从零到全速的时间。
govSpoolupTimeHelp.english: Time constant for slow spoolup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.

govTrackingTimeHelp.message: 主旋翼速度变化的时间常数，以秒为单位，测量从零到全速前进的时间。
govTrackingTimeHelp.english: Time constant for headspeed changes, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.

govRecoveryTimeHelp.message: 恢复二阶启动的时间常数，以秒为单位，测量从零到全速的时间。
govRecoveryTimeHelp.english: Time constant for recovery spoolup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.

govAutoBailoutTimeHelp.message: 熄火重启保护的时间常数（秒），测量主旋翼从零到全速的时间。
govAutoBailoutTimeHelp.english: Time constant for autorotation bailout spoolup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.

govAutoTimeoutHelp.message: 结束熄火降落并进入正常IDLE状态的超时时间。
govAutoTimeoutHelp.english: Timeout for ending autorotation and moving to normal IDLE.

govAutoMinEntryTime.message: 熄火降落最小进入时间 [秒]

govAutoMinEntryTimeHelp.message: 启动熄火降落前的最短飞行时间。
govAutoMinEntryTimeHelp.english: Minimum flight time before autorotation can be engaged.

govZeroThrottleTimeoutHelp.message: 在关闭定速器之前，丢失(零)油门信号的超时时间。如果在此时间内恢复油门信号，定速器将执行恢复 Spoolup 启动。
govZeroThrottleTimeoutHelp.english: Timeout for missing (zero) throttle signal, before shutting down the governor. If the throttle signal returns within this timeout, the governor will perform a recovery spoolup.

govLostHeadspeedTimeout.message: 主旋翼转速信号超时 [秒]

govLostHeadspeedTimeoutHelp.message: 丢失主旋翼转速信号超过此时间，才会降速。如果在此时间内恢复转速信号，定速器将执行恢复 Spoolup 启动。
govLostHeadspeedTimeoutHelp.english: Timeout for missing headspeed signal, before spooling down. If the RPM signal returns within this timeout, the governor will perform a recovery spoolup.

govHeadspeedFilterHz.message: 主旋翼转速滤波器截止点 [Hz]

govHeadspeedFilterHzHelp.message: 主旋翼转速 PID 输入低通滤波器的截止点。
govHeadspeedFilterHzHelp.english: Cutoff for the headspeed PID input lowpass filter.

govVoltageFilterHz.message: 电池电压滤波器截止点 [Hz]

govVoltageFilterHzHelp.message: 电池电压低通滤波器的截止点。
govVoltageFilterHzHelp.english: Cutoff for the battery voltage lowpass filter.

govTTAFilterHzHelp.message: 尾旋翼扭转辅助（TTA）输入低通滤波器的截止点。
govTTAFilterHzHelp.english: Cutoff for the TTA input lowpass filter.

govHeadspeedHelp.message: 定速器的目标转速是通过最高转速与油门输入量相乘计算得出的
govHeadspeedHelp.english: The governor target headspeed is calculated by multiplying the full headspeed with the throttle input.

govHeadspeedNote.message: 警告：改变主旋翼转速将影响 PID 调整。如果您已经调整了 PID 控制器增益，则可能需要重复调整。
govHeadspeedNote.english: Warning: Changing the headspeed will affect the PID tuning. If you have already tuned the PID Controller Gains, it is likely you will need to repeat the tuning.

govMaxThrottleHelp.message: Maximum output throttle the governor is allowed to use.
govMaxThrottleHelp.english: Maximum output throttle the governor is allowed to use.

govMasterGainHelp.message: 主 PID 循环的增益，通常是10..100

govPGainHelp.message: PID 循环中的 P 增益，通常是10..100

govIGainHelp.message: PID 循环中的 I 增益，通常是10..100

govDGainHelp.message: PID 循环中的 D 增益，通常是10..100

govFGainHelp.message: 集体螺距/循环螺距的前馈增益，通常是10..100

govTTAGainHelp.message: 尾旋翼扭矩辅助增益。这是一个增益，用于增加主旋翼转速，以控制负方向的尾旋翼（例如，电机直驱尾旋翼低于空转速度）。通常为 0...100
govTTAGainHelp.english: Tail Torque Assist gain. This is a gain applied to increase the headspeed to control the tail in the negative direction (e.g. Motorised tail less than idle speed). Usually 0..100

govTTALimit.message: 尾旋翼扭矩辅助（TTA）增益限制

govTTALimitHelp.message: 尾旋翼扭矩辅助最大值。在负方向控制尾旋翼时，可额外增加的主旋翼转速。通常为 0...50
govTTALimitHelp.english: Tail Torque Assist maximum. How much extra headspeed can be applied to control the tail in the negative direction. Usually 0..50

govYawPrecompHelp.message: 偏航预补偿权重。确定前馈中混合的尾舵量。这有助于调速器主动保持头速。通常 20..100
govYawPrecompHelp.english: Yaw precompensation weight. Determines how much Yaw is mixed into the feedforward. This helps the governor to maintain the headspeed proactively. Usually 20..100

govCyclicPrecompHelp.message: 循环螺距预补偿权重。决定前馈中混控多少循环螺距。这有助于定速器主动保持主旋翼速度。通常为 20...100
govCyclicPrecompHelp.english: Cyclic precompensation weight. Determines how much cyclic is mixed into the feedforward. This helps the governor to maintain the headspeed proactively. Usually 20..100

govCollectivePrecompHelp.message: 集体螺距预补偿权重。决定前馈中混控多少集体螺距。这有助于定速器主动保持主旋翼速度。通常为 20...100
govCollectivePrecompHelp.english: Collective precompensation weight. Determines how much collective is mixed into the feedfoward. This helps the governor to maintain the headspeed proactively. Usually 20..100

sensorsInfo.message:
请注意，设置过高的图形刷新率会缩短尤其是笔记本电脑的电池使用时间。
建议只打开你感兴趣的传感器的图形显示并使用合理的刷新率
sensorsInfo.english:
Keep in mind that using fast update periods and rendering multiple graphs at the same time is resource heavy and will burn your battery quicker if you use a laptop.
We recommend to only render graphs for sensors you are interested in while using reasonable update periods.

sensorsAltitudeHint.message: 高度的计算方法是将气压计(如果可用) 的输出与 GPS(如果可用) 的高度输出结合起来。如果已连接到一个 GPS 模块且 GPS 模块定位成功后，则将在未解锁时显示相对于海平面的绝对高度。解锁后，显示相对于解锁时的相对高度。
sensorsAltitudeHint.english: The altitude is calculated by combining the output of the barometer (if available) with the altitude output from the GPS (if available). If a GPS connected and the GPS has a fix, the absolute altitude above sea level will be shown when disarmed. When armed, the altitude relative to the position when arming will be shown.

cliInfo.message:
注意：退出 CLI 页面或者点击断开连接将自动向飞控发送“退出”指令。在最新的固件中这将使飞控重启并且未保存的设置将会丢失。

警告：CLI中的某些命令可能导致电机输出引脚发出随机指令。如果连接电池，这有可能导致电机旋转。因此，强烈建议在 CLI 中输入命令之前确保未连接电池。
cliInfo.english:
Note: Leaving CLI tab or pressing Disconnect will automatically send "exit" to the board. With the latest firmware this will make the controller restart and unsaved changes will be lost.

Warning: Some commands in CLI can result in arbitrary signals being sent on the motor output pins. This can cause motors to spin up if a battery is connected. Therefore it is highly recommended to make sure that no battery is connected before entering commands in CLI.

cliInputPlaceholder.message: 在这里输入你的命令。按 Tab 可以进行自动填充。
cliInputPlaceholder.english: Write your command here. Press Tab for AutoComplete.

cliInputPlaceholderBuilding.message: 正在构建“自动填充”缓存，请稍候…
cliInputPlaceholderBuilding.english: Please wait while building AutoComplete cache ...

cliConfirmSnippetDialogTitle.message: 已加载文件{{fileName}}。查看已加载的命令
cliConfirmSnippetDialogTitle.english: Loaded file {{fileName}}. Review the loaded commands

cliConfirmSnippetNote.message: 注意: 您可以在执行前查看和编辑命令。
cliConfirmSnippetNote.english: Note: You can review and edit commands before execution.

dialogCLIExitNote.message:
输入 save 将保存并退出命令行（CLI）

输入 exit 将放弃更改并退出命令行（CLI)
dialogCLIExitNote.english:
Type save to save changes and exit CLI.

Type exit to discard changes and exit CLI.

loggingNote.message:
数据仅会在此页面记录，关闭此页面将会 取消数据记录，并且应用将会返回“普通配置” 状态。
你可以选择合适的全局刷新率，飞控出于性能考虑，只会每 1 秒写入一次日志。
loggingNote.english:
Data will be logged in this tab only, leaving the tab will cancel logging and application will return to its normal "configurator" state.
You are free to select the global update period, data will be written into the log file every 1 second for performance reasons.

loggingErrorOneProperty.message: 至少需要选择一个数据集来记录
loggingErrorOneProperty.english: Please select at least one property to log

loggingAutomaticallyRetained.message: 已自动加载上一个记录文件: $1

blackboxNotSupported.message: 该飞控固件不支持黑盒日志记录
blackboxNotSupported.english: Your flight controller's firmware does not support Blackbox logging.

blackboxMaybeSupported.message: 飞控固件版本太低，无法打开该页面，或者黑盒功能没有在设置页面打开。
blackboxMaybeSupported.english: Your flight controller's firmware is too old to support this tab, or the Blackbox feature is disabled on the Configuration tab.

serialLoggingSupportedNote.message: 你可以使用串口外接记录设备来记录日志（例如 OpenLager）。需要在串口设置页设置相应的串口。
serialLoggingSupportedNote.english: You can log to an external logging device (such as an OpenLager) by using a serial port. Configure the port on the Ports tab.

sdcardNote.message: 飞行数据可以保存到板载的SD卡槽。
sdcardNote.english: Flight logs can be recorded to your flight controller's onboard SD card slot.

dataflashNote.message: 飞行数据可以保存到板载的闪存内。
dataflashNote.english: Flight logs can be recorded to your flight controller's onboard dataflash chip.

dataflashNotPresentNote.message: 你的飞控没有可用的闪存芯片。
dataflashNotPresentNote.english: Your flight controller does not have a compatible dataflash chip available.

dataflashFirmwareUpgradeRequired.message: 板载闪存需要固件版本 >= 1.8.0。

dataflashSavetoFileNote.message:
直接将闪存保存到文件是的速度是比较缓慢的，且容易发生内部错误/文件损坏。
在某些情况下，它将适用于小文件， 但我们并不支持这样做，并且相关的支持请求将会被关闭且不会得到回复 - 请使用大容量存储模式。
dataflashSavetoFileNote.english:
Directly saving flash to file is slow and inherently prone to error / file corruption.
In some cases it will work for small files, but this is not supported and support requests for it will be closed without comment - use Mass Storage mode instead.

dataflashSaveFileDepreciationHint.message: 这种方式十分缓慢，且容易发生内部错误/文件损坏，这是因为 MSP 连接其本身具有一些基本的内部限制，这使得它并不适合进行文件传输。它可能仅能传输较小的日志文件。如果您在使用此方法保存文件时传输失败，请不要创建支持请求。 推荐的方法是使用 '$t(onboardLoggingRebootMscText)。 essage)' (下面) 激活大容量存储模式，并将您的飞行控制器设置为存储设备以访问并下载日志文件。
dataflashSaveFileDepreciationHint.english: This method is slow and inherently prone to error / file corruption, because the MSP connection itself has intrinsic, fundamental limitations that make it unsuitable for file transfers. It may work for small log files only. Do not create support requests if file transfers fail when saved using this method. The recommended method is to use '$t(blackboxRebootMscText.message)' (below) to activate the Mass Storage Mode, and access your flight controller as a storage device to download the log files.

dataflashConfirmEraseNote.message: 这将会擦除闪存里面保存的所有黑盒日志。它将耗时20秒左右，确定继续？
dataflashConfirmEraseNote.english: This will erase any Blackbox logs or other data contained in the dataflash. It should take about 20 seconds, are you sure?

dataflashSavingTitle.message: 正在保存闪存数据到文件

dataflashSavingNote.message: 保存闪存数据到文件可能会需要几分钟，请等待。
dataflashSavingNote.english: Saving could take several minutes, please wait.

dataflashSavingNoteAfter.message: 保存成功，点击 “确认” 继续

dataflashFileWriteFailed.message: 写入文件失败，请确认文件和文件夹权限。
dataflashFileWriteFailed.english: Failed to write to the file you selected, are the permissions on that folder okay?

firmwareFlasherTargetWarning.message: 重要：请选择飞控对应的固件，如果烧写错误的固件将会导致 糟糕 的事发生。
firmwareFlasherTargetWarning.english: IMPORTANT: Ensure you flash a file appropriate for your target. Flashing a binary for the wrong target can cause bad things to happen.

firmwareFlasherLoadedConfig.message: 已加载目标，请加载固件文件
firmwareFlasherLoadedConfig.english: Loaded target, please load firmware file

firmwareFlasherOnlineSelectBuildType.message: 选择 "生成类型" 以查看可用的飞控板。
firmwareFlasherOnlineSelectBuildType.english: Select build type to see available boards.

firmwareFlasherOnlineSelectBoardDescript.message: 选择或自动检测您的飞控板以查看可用的在线固件发布版 - 选择适合您飞控板的正确固件。
firmwareFlasherOnlineSelectBoardDescript.english: Select your board to see available online firmware releases - Select the correct firmware appropriate for your board.

firmwareFlasherOnlineSelectBoardHint.message:
统一目标的概念意味着使用相同 MCU（F4、F7、H7）的所有电路板均可使用相同的固件 .hex 文件。为了使不同的电路板使用相同的固件，在刷写统一目标时，固件会同时部署一个特定的配置文件。
此版本的 Betaflight 配置器支持在一个步骤中闪存带有各自飞控板特定配置的统一目标。每个板可用的不同固件类型在下拉菜单中显示如下：

<飞控板名称> or
<飞控板名称> (传统):
非统一目标.

<飞控板名称> (<制造商ID>):
(4 个字符的制造商 ID)
统一目标。

请使用可用的统一目标。
firmwareFlasherOnlineSelectBoardHint.english:
The concept of Unified Targets means that the same firmware .hex file can be used for all boards using the same MCU (F4, F7, H7). To make the different boards work with the same firmware, a specific configuration file is deployed alongside the firmware when a Unified Target is flashed.
This version of Betaflight configurator supports flashing of Unified Targets with the respective board specific configurations in one step. The different firmware types that are available for each board are shown in the drop-down as follows:

<board name> or
<board name> (Legacy):
non-unified target.

<board name> (<manufacturer id>):
(4 character manufacturer id)
Unified Target.

Please use Unified Targets where available.

firmwareFlasherOnlineSelectFirmwareVersi.message: 选择对应你飞控型号的固件版本
firmwareFlasherOnlineSelectFirmwareVersi.english: Select firmware version for your board.

firmwareFlasherWarningText.message:
请仅使用此固件刷写器刷写 Rotorflight 或 Betaflight 硬件。

注意：STM32 引导加载程序存储在 ROM 中，不会出现变砖的情况。
注意： 在使用固件刷新程序时，自动连接（Auto-Connect）功能始终处于禁用状态。
注意：确保有备份；某些升级/降级会清除你的配置。
注意： 如果在刷写过程中遇到问题，请先断开 FC 上的所有电缆连接，尝试重启并升级驱动程序。
注意： 在刷写直接连接 USB 插座的电路板（大多数较新的电路板）时，确保已阅读手册中的 USB 刷写部分，并安装了正确的软件和驱动程序。
firmwareFlasherWarningText.english:
Please do ONLY flash Rotorflight or Betaflight hardware with this firmware flasher.

Note: STM32 bootloader is stored in ROM, it cannot be bricked.
Note: Auto-Connect is always disabled while you are inside firmware flasher.
Note: Make sure you have a backup; some upgrades/downgrades will wipe your configuration.
Note: If you have problems flashing try disconnecting all cables from your FC first, try rebooting, upgrade drivers.
Note: When flashing boards that have directly connected USB sockets (most newer boards) ensure you have read the USB Flashing section of the manual and have the correct software and drivers installed

firmwareFlasherRecoveryText.message:
如果与飞控板失去通信，请按照以下步骤恢复通信：
  • 断开电源
  • 启用无序列重启以及全盘擦除
  • 按下或短接BOOT按钮
  • 接通电源（如果操作正确，活动 LED 指示灯不会闪烁）。
  • 如果需要请安装所有 STM32 驱动 以及 Zadig (参见手册中的 USB 刷写 部分)。
  • 关闭并重启配置器
  • 如果飞控板有 BOOT 按钮，此时松开 BOOT 按钮
  • 使用正确的固件刷写（如果 FC 手册有规定，请使用手动波特率）。
  • 断开电源
  • 移除 BOOT 跳线
  • 接通电源（活动 LED 应闪烁）。
  • 正常连接
firmwareFlasherRecoveryText.english:
If you have lost communication with your board follow these steps to restore communication:
  • Power off
  • Enable 'No reboot sequence', enable 'Full chip erase'.
  • Jumper the BOOT pins or hold BOOT button.
  • Power on (activity LED will NOT flash if done correctly).
  • Install all STM32 drivers and Zadig if required (see USB Flashing section of the manual).
  • Close configurator, Restart Configurator.
  • Release BOOT button if your FC has one.
  • Flash with correct firmware (using manual baud rate if specified in your FC's manual).
  • Power off.
  • Remove BOOT jumper.
  • Power on (activity LED should flash).
  • Connect normally.

unstableFirmwareAcknoledgementDialog.message:
您将要刷入一个开发版本固件。这些固件仍在开发中，并且可能会造成下列问题：
  • 固件完全不工作；
  • 固件无法飞行；
  • 固件存在安全性问题
  • 固件可能会造成飞控变砖，甚至损坏；
如果您继续刷入此固件，您将对上述所有风险承担全部责任。此外，您需要明白，您必须在尝试解锁起飞之前卸下螺旋桨并进行必要的测试。
unstableFirmwareAcknoledgementDialog.english:
You are about to flash a development build of the firmware. These builds are a work in progress, and any of the following can be the case:
  • the firmware does not work at all;
  • the firmware is not flyable;
  • there are safety issues with the firmware, for example flyaways
  • the firmware can cause the flight controller to become unresponsive, or damaged
If you proceed with flashing this firmware, you are assuming full responsibility for the risk of any of the above happening. Furthermore you acknowledge that it is necessary to perform thorough bench tests with props off before any attempts to fly this firmware.

unstableFirmwareAcknoledgementAcknowledg.message: 我已阅读上述声明并且<strong>我自愿承担刷入不稳定版本固件的一切后果<strong>
unstableFirmwareAcknoledgementAcknowledg.english: I have read the above and <strong>I assume full responsibility<strong> for flashing unstable firmware

The flight controller can control colors and effects of individual LEDs on a strip.
Configure LEDs on the grid, configure wiring order then attach LEDs on your aircraft according to grid positions. LEDs without wire ordering number will not be saved.
Double-click on a color to edit the HSV values.

profilesErrorLimitHelp.message: PID 循环中角度误差的硬限制。绝对误差以及 I 项永远不会超过这些限制。
profilesErrorLimitHelp.english: Hard limit for the angle error in the PID loop. The absolute error and thus the I-term will never go above these limits.

profilesOffsetLimitHelp.message: PID 循环中偏移角的硬限制。绝对偏移量以及 O 项(高速优化)永远不会超过这些限制。
profilesOffsetLimitHelp.english: Hard limit for the offset angle in the PID loop. The absolute offset and thus the O-term will never go above these limits.

profilesOffsetGainHelp.message: PID循环中的 O 项增益 (作用于高速飞行中的 I 项)。
profilesOffsetGainHelp.english: Gain for Offset term (Integral for high speed flight).

profilesErrorDecayTimeGroundHelp.message: 当直升机不在空中时，释放当前控制器的误差。这有助于防止直升机在地面上翻倒。
profilesErrorDecayTimeGroundHelp.english: Bleeds off the current controller error when the craft is not airborne. This helps preventing the craft from tipping over on the ground.

profilesErrorRotationHelp.message: 当直升机机身旋转时，围绕航向轴旋转当前的副翼和升降误差项。这有时称为Piro补偿。
profilesErrorRotationHelp.english: Rotates the current Roll and Pitch Error Terms around Yaw when the craft rotates. This is sometimes called Piro Compensation.

profilesItermRelaxHelp.message: 快速打杆(升降/副翼/航向)时，可限制 I-term的累积。这有助于减少翻滚和其他快速运动结束时的反弹。
profilesItermRelaxHelp.english: Limits the accumulation of I-term when fast movements happen. This helps in the reduction of bounceback at the end of rolls and other fast movements.

profilesItermRelaxTypeHelp.message:
选择使用 I-Term 释放的轴。
RP: 副翼，升降
RPY: 副翼，升降，航向
profilesItermRelaxTypeHelp.english:
Choose the axes in which this is active.
RP: Roll, Pitch
RPY: Roll, Pitch, Yaw.

profilesItermRelaxCutoffHelp.message:
较低的数值可抑制移动后的反弹，较高的数值可提高高速旋转的精确度。
小型直升机设置为15-30, 中型直升机设置为10-15，大型直升机设置为小于10。
profilesItermRelaxCutoffHelp.english:
Lower values suppress bounce-back after movements, high values increase high-rate turn precision.
Set to 15-30 for small helis, 10-15 for mid-size, and less than 10 for large.

profilesGyroCutoffHelp.english: PID Loop overall bandwidth in Hz

profilesAcroTrainerGainHelp.message: 手动模式教练增益。Acro 教练模式直升机不会自动回正，但可以限制最大副翼/升降角度。这决定了在 Acro 教练模式下，直升机超过最大角度时，会有多大的强度纠正姿态。
profilesAcroTrainerGainHelp.english: Acro Trainer gain. Acro trainer Mode is not self leveling but does limit the maximum pitch/roll angle. This determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to the maximum angle (if exceeded) while in Acro Trainer Mode

profilesAcroTrainerLimit.message: 手动模式教练角度限制

profilesAcroTrainerLimitHelp.message: 手动模式教练角度限制。Acro 教练模式不会自动回正（与自稳或半自稳模式一样），但会限制直升机升降/副翼的最大角度。
profilesAcroTrainerLimitHelp.english: Acro Trainer angle limit. Acro Trainer mode does not self level (like Angle or Horizon Modes); however, it does limit the maximum angle the helicopter will pitch/roll to

profilesAngleModeLimitHelp.message: 自稳模式最大角度。直升机在自稳模式时允许的最大倾斜角度

gyroLowpassFilterHelp.message: 低通滤波器有两种：静态和动态。对于一个确定的低通滤波器编号，只能同时启用一个（静态或动态）。静态滤波器只有一个截止值，该值以某种方式定义了滤波器的起始位置。动态滤波器定义了最小值和最大值，也就是截止点所在的范围。在油门变化的同时，截止值也会从最小值移动到最大值。
gyroLowpassFilterHelp.english: The Lowpass Filters can have two variants: static and dynamic. For a determined lowpass filter number only one (static or dynamic) can be enabled at the same time. The static only has a Cutoff that is a value that defines in some way where the filter starts. The dynamic defines a min and max values, that is the range where the Cutoff is placed. This Cutoff moves from min to max at the same time than you move the throttle stick.

gyroNotch1Frequency.message: 陀螺仪陷波器 1 中心频率 [Hz]

gyroNotch2Frequency.message: 陀螺仪陷波器 2 中心频率 [Hz]

gyroNotch1Cutoff.message: 陀螺仪陷波器 1 截止频率 [Hz]

gyroNotch2Cutoff.message: 陀螺仪陷波器 2 截止频率 [Hz]

gyroNotchFilterHelp.message: 陷波滤波器有一个中心点和一个截止点。陷波滤波器是对称的。中心频率是滤波器的中心，截止频率是陷波滤波器的起始频率。例如，陷波截止频率为 160，陷波中心频率为 260，这意味着滤波器的频率范围为 160-360Hz，中心频率附近的衰减最大。
gyroNotchFilterHelp.english: The Notch Filter has a Center and a Cutoff. The filter is symmetrical. The Center Frequency is the center of the filter and the Cutoff Frequency is where Notch filter starts. For example with Notch Cutoff of 160 and Notch Center of 260 it means the range is 160-360Hz with most attenuation around center

gyroDynamicNotchFilterHelp.message: Dynamic Notch Filter tracks peak noise frequencies and places notch filters with their center at that frequency. Requires at least 1k filter or loop rate.
gyroDynamicNotchFilterHelp.english: Dynamic Notch Filter tracks peak noise frequencies and places notch filters with their center at that frequency. Requires at least 1k filter or loop rate.

previous.message: 动态陷波滤波器识别电机噪声峰值频率，并将一个或两个陷波滤波器的中心应用于该频率上。
previous.english: Dynamic Notch Filter tracks peak motors noise frequency and places one or two notch filters with their center at that frequency.

gyroDynamicNotchCountHelp.message: This sets the number of dynamic notch filters. Setting it at 0 will disable dynamic notch filter. If used standalone, 2 is absolute minimum, 4-6 recommended.
gyroDynamicNotchCountHelp.english: This sets the number of dynamic notch filters. Setting it at 0 will disable dynamic notch filter. If used standalone, 2 is absolute minimum, 4-6 recommended.

gyroDynamicNotchQHelp.message: Q factor adjust how narrow or wide the dynamic notch filters are. Higher value makes it narrower and more precise and lower value makes it wider and broader. Values between 2.0 and 3.0 are recommended.
gyroDynamicNotchQHelp.english: Q factor adjust how narrow or wide the dynamic notch filters are. Higher value makes it narrower and more precise and lower value makes it wider and broader. Values between 2.0 and 3.0 are recommended.

previous.message: Q因子调整了动态陷波滤波器的宽度。更高的值将使其变得更窄、更精准，较低的值将使其变得更宽、更宽泛。将Q调到很低将会带来很大的滤波器延迟。
previous.english: Q factor adjust how narrow or wide the dynamic notch filters are. Higher value makes it narrower and more precise and lower value makes it wider and broader. Having a really low value will greatly increase filter delay.

gyroDynamicNotchMinHzHelp.message: Set this to the lowest incoming noise frequency that is needed to be controlled by the dynamic notch. Should be lower than main rotor frequency, but no lower that 20Hz, which is eqivalent of 1200 rpm
gyroDynamicNotchMinHzHelp.english: Set this to the lowest incoming noise frequency that is needed to be controlled by the dynamic notch. Should be lower than main rotor frequency, but no lower that 20Hz, which is eqivalent of 1200 rpm

previous.message: 将此设置为需要由动态陷波器控制的传入噪声的最低频率。
previous.english: Set this to the lowest incoming noise frequency that is needed to be controlled by the dynamic notch.

gyroDynamicNotchMaxHzHelp.message: Set this to the highest incoming noise frequency that is needed to be controlled by the dynamic notch. Should be about 10-20% higher than max tail rotor frequency, but no higher than 250Hz if filter rate is 1k. If filter rate is 2k or more, then 330-500 Hz can be used, especially for smaller helis or that with motorized tail (higher range means less precision and performance)
gyroDynamicNotchMaxHzHelp.english: Set this to the highest incoming noise frequency that is needed to be controlled by the dynamic notch. Should be about 10-20% higher than max tail rotor frequency, but no higher than 250Hz if filter rate is 1k. If filter rate is 2k or more, then 330-500 Hz can be used, especially for smaller helis or that with motorized tail (higher range means less precision and performance)

previous.message: 将此设置为需要由动态陷波器控制的传入噪声的最高频率。
previous.english: Set this to the highest incoming noise frequency that is needed to be controlled by the dynamic notch.

gyroRpmFilterHelp.message:
转速控制滤波是陀螺上的一组陷波滤波器，它利用转速遥测数据以外科手术般精准去除噪声。

重要: 电调必须支持双向DShot协议，并且$t(tabmotors.com message)选项卡中的$t(configurationMotorPoles.message)的值必须正确才能使此过滤器工作。
gyroRpmFilterHelp.english:
RPM controlled filtering is a bank of notch filters on gyro which use the RPM telemetry data to remove noise with surgical precision.

IMPORTANT: The ESC must support the Bidirectional DShot protocol and the value of the $t(configurationMotorPoles.message) in the $t(tabMotors.message) tab must be correct for this filter to work.

failsafeFeaturesHelpNew.message:
失控保护有两个阶段。若飞控在任一接收通道收到无效的脉冲长度，或者接收机汇报已失控，或者彻底没有收到接收机信号，飞控将进入一阶失控保护状态。飞控将会在所有通道使用预置通道设置，如果短时间内信号恢复将可退出失控保护状态。若直升机处于解锁状态，并且一阶失控保护模式持续时间超过了预设的时间，飞控将进入二价失控保护状态，所有通道将会保持当前输出。
注意： 在飞控进入一阶失控保护之前，如果AUX 通道出现无效的脉冲，该通道一样会使用预置通道设置。
failsafeFeaturesHelpNew.english:
Failsafe has two stages. Stage 1 is entered when a flightchannel has an invalid pulse length, the receiver reports failsafe mode or there is no signal from the receiver at all, the channel fallback settings are applied to all channels and a short amount of time is provided to allow for recovery. Stage 2 is entered when the error condition takes longer than the configured guard time while the craft is armed, all channels will remain at the applied channel fallback setting unless overruled by the chosen procedure.
Note: Prior to entering stage 1, channel fallback settings are also applied to individual AUX channels that have invalid pulses.

failsafePulsrangeHelp.message: 脉冲长度小于最小，或者超过最大，都会被认为是无效脉冲。将会触发单个通道的预置设置覆盖，或引起一阶失控保护。
failsafePulsrangeHelp.english: Pulses shorter than minimum or longer than maximum are invalid and will trigger application of individual channel fallback settings for AUX channels or entering stage 1 for flightchannels

failsafeChannelFallbackSettingsHelp.message: 当进入一阶失控保护时，这些设置将会应用于单独无效的AUX 通道，或者是所有通道。注意：数值应是25us的整数倍，小于25us的设置会被上下取整。
failsafeChannelFallbackSettingsHelp.english: These settings are applied to invalid individual AUX channels or to all channels when entering stage 1. Note: values are saved in steps of 25usec, so small changes disappear

failsafeChannelFallbackSettingsAuto.message: 自动 指的是 横滚、俯仰、方向都回中，油门最低。 保持 指的是 所有通道保持最后从接收机接收到的有效的数值。
failsafeChannelFallbackSettingsAuto.english: Auto means Roll, Pitch and Yaw to center and Throttle low. Hold means maintain the last good value received

failsafeChannelFallbackSettingsHold.message: 保持指的是 所有通道保持最后接收到的有效的数值。设置 指的是 通道使用在这里设定的值。
failsafeChannelFallbackSettingsHold.english: Hold means maintain the last good value received. Set means the value given here will be used

failsafeStageTwoSettingsTitle.message: 二阶失控保护 - 设置

failsafeDelayItem.message: 触发二阶失控保护的信号丢失保护时间 [秒]
failsafeDelayItem.english: Guard time for stage 2 activation after signal lost [s]

failsafeDelayHelp.message: 一阶失控保护等待信号恢复时间
failsafeDelayHelp.english: Time for stage 1 to wait for recovery

failsafeThrottleLowItem.message: 低油门失控保护延迟 [秒]

failsafeThrottleLowHelp.message: 在油门保持低位超过该时间，不再执行失控保护措施转而直接锁定电机。
failsafeThrottleLowHelp.english: Just disarm the craft instead of executing the selected failsafe procedure when the throttle was low for this amount of time

failsafeOffDelayItem.message: 失控保护过程中关闭电机延时 [秒]
failsafeOffDelayItem.english: Delay for turning off the Motors during Failsafe [s]

failsafeOffDelayHelp.message: 暂时保持在降落模式而不锁定电机的时间
failsafeOffDelayHelp.english: Time to stay in landing mode until the motors are turned off and the craft is disarmed

failsafeGpsRescueItemAllowArmingWithoutF.message: 允许在未锁定的情况下解锁 - 警告: 这样将无法使用GPS救援
failsafeGpsRescueItemAllowArmingWithoutF.english: Allow arming without fix - WARNING: the GPS Rescue will not be available

failsafeKillSwitchItem.message: 失控保护开关 （在模式页面设置失控保护模式）
failsafeKillSwitchItem.english: Failsafe Kill Switch (setup Failsafe in Modes Tab)

failsafeKillSwitchHelp.message: 设置这个选项会使失控保护开关(模式页面设置)作为直接关闭开关，将会绕开所有的失控保护检测程序。注意: 当打开失控保护开关时，解锁开关无效
failsafeKillSwitchHelp.english: Set this option to make the failsafe switch (Modes Tab) act as a direct kill switch, bypassing the selected failsafe procedure. Note: Arming is blocked with the failsafe kill switch in the ON position

failsafeSwitchModeHelp.message:
此选项确定通过辅助开关激活失控保护时发生的情况:
阶段 1 激活阶段1失控保护。如果要模拟信号丢失时的失控保护行为，此功能非常有用。
阶段 2 跳过阶段1并立即激活阶段2流程
终止 立即锁定 （你的直升机将会坠毁）
failsafeSwitchModeHelp.english:
This option determines what happens when Failsafe is activated through AUX switch:
Stage 1 activates Stage 1 failsafe. This is useful if you want to simulate the exact signal loss failsafe behavior.
Stage 2 skips Stage 1 and activates the Stage 2 procedure immediately
Kill disarms instantly (your craft will crash)

powerFirmwareUpgradeRequired.message: 固件更新 要求。 电池/电流/电压通过API < 1.33.0 设置。 (Betaflight 版本<= 3.17) 不支持。
powerFirmwareUpgradeRequired.english: Firmware upgrade required. Battery/Amperage/Voltage configurations using API < 1.33.0 (Betaflight release <= 3.17) is not supported.

powerCalibrationManagerHelp.message: 要校准，请使用万用表测量你的直升机上(接上电池) 的实际电压/电流，然后在下方输入值。然后，在同一块电池仍然接入的情况下，点击 [Calibrate] 按钮。
powerCalibrationManagerHelp.english: To calibrate, use a multimeter to measure the actual voltage / current draw on your craft (with a battery plugged in), and enter the values below. Then, with the same battery still plugged in, click [Calibrate].

powerCalibrationManagerNote.message:
注意：在校准缩放之前，请确保电压和电流漂移的除数和乘数设置正确。
将值设置为0将不会应用校准。
切记在插入电池之前移除螺旋桨！
powerCalibrationManagerNote.english:
Note: Before calibrating the scale make sure that divider and multiplier for voltage and offset for amperage is set properly.
Leaving the values at 0 will not apply calibration.
Remember to remove propellers before plugging in a battery!

powerCalibrationManagerWarning.message: 警告：电池未接入或电压计源和电流计源没有正确设置。请确保电压计和/或电流计读数超过0. 否则您将无法使用此工具进行校准。
powerCalibrationManagerWarning.english: Warning: The battery is not plugged in or voltage and amperage meter sources are not set properly. Make sure that the voltage and/or amperage are reading a value above 0. Otherwise you will not be able to calibrate using this tool.

powerCalibrationManagerSourceNote.message: 警告：电压计和/或电流计测量源已经更改，但未保存。请在校准之前设置并保存正确的测量源。
powerCalibrationManagerSourceNote.english: Warning: Voltage and/or amperage meter sources have been changed but not saved. Please set the correct meter sources and save them before trying to calibrate.

powerCalibrationConfirmHelp.message:
这里显示新的校准放缩表。
应用它们将会设置缩放但并不会保存。

在保存之后，请确保新的电压和电流读数正确。
powerCalibrationConfirmHelp.english:
New calibrated scales are shown here.
Applying them will set the scales but will not save them.

After saving make sure that the new voltage and current are correct.

vtxHelp.message:
这里可以定义图传用到的值。如果你的图传支持，你可以查看和修改发送功率和图传表。
按以下步骤设置你的图传：
1. 打开这个页面；
2. 找到并下载适合你的图传型号和所在地区的图传配置文件；
3. 点击下方'$t(vtxButtonLoadFile.message)'，选择并加载图传配置文件；
4. 确认设置正确；
5. 点击'$t(vtxButtonSave.message)'保存图传设置到飞控。
6. （可选）点击'$t(vtxButtonSaveLua.message)'保存 Lua 配置文件供 Betaflight Lua 脚本使用。（在这里查看更多。）
vtxHelp.english:
Here you can configure the values for your Video Transmitter (VTX). You can view and change the transmission values, including the VTX Tables, if the flight controller and the VTX support it.
To set up your VTX use the following steps:
1. Go to this page;
2. Find the appropriate VTX configuration file for your country and your VTX model and download it;
3. Click '$t(vtxButtonLoadFile.message)' below, select the VTX configuration file, load it;
4. Verify that the settings are correct;
5. Click '$t(vtxButtonSave.message)' to store the VTX settings on the flight controller.
6. Optionally click '$t(vtxButtonSaveLua.message)' to save a lua configuration file you can use with the betaflight lua scripts (See more here.)
vtxHelp.description: Introduction message in the VTX tab

vtxMessageNotSupported.message: 注意:您的图传未配置或不支持。所以您不能在此修改图传值。只有当图传使用Tramp或SmartAudio等协议，连接到飞行控制器，并在$t(tabPorts.message)页面中正确配置后，才可以使用。
vtxMessageNotSupported.english: Attention: Your VTX is not configured or not supported. So you can't modify the VTX values from here. This will only be possible if the flight controller is attached to the VTX using some protocol like Tramp or SmartAudio and is correctly configured in the $t(tabPorts.message) tab if needed.
vtxMessageNotSupported.description: Message to show when the VTX is not supported in the VTX tab

vtxMessageTableNotConfigured.message: 注意:在使用$t(vtxSelectedMode.message)之前，必须先在下面配置并保存图传表
vtxMessageTableNotConfigured.english: Attention: You need to configure and save FIRST the VTX Table at the bottom before you can make use of the $t(vtxSelectedMode.message) fields.
vtxMessageTableNotConfigured.description: Message to show when the VTX is not supported in the VTX tab

vtxMessageFactoryBandsNotSupported.message: 注意： 选定的图传不支持以“工厂模式”设置频段，但您的部分频段设置中使用了这个功能。点击 '$t(vtxButtonSave.message)' 以修复这个问题。
vtxMessageFactoryBandsNotSupported.english: Attention: The selected VTX type does not support the 'factory' setting for bands, but some of your bands have this setting. Click '$t(vtxButtonSave.message)' to fix this.
vtxMessageFactoryBandsNotSupported.description: Message to show when the configured VTX type does not support factory bands, but one or more of the configured bands are of this type

vtxPitModeHelp.message:
启用时，图传将进入功率极低的模式，可以在不影响其他飞行员的情况下对直升机进行维护。通常来说，此模式的有效范围小于5米。

注意: 一些协议，如SmartAudio，在图传上电之后无法通过软件方式开启Pit模式。
vtxPitModeHelp.english:
When enabled, the VTX enters in a very low power mode to let the quad be on at the bench without disturbing other pilots. Usually the range of this mode is less than 5m.

NOTE: Some protocols, like SmartAudio, can't enable Pit Mode via software after power-up.

vtxTablePowerLevelsHelp.english: This defines the number of power levels supported by your VTX
vtxTablePowerLevelsHelp.description: Help for the number of power levels field of the VTX Table element in the VTX tab

vtxTablePowerLevelsTableHelp.message:
该表展示了可用于图传的不同功率。它分为两部分:
- $t(vtxTablePowerLevelsValue.message):每个功率级别都需要有一个由硬件制造商定义的值。请您联系制造商以获取正确的值，或使用Betaflight的wiki说明 VTX Table 的内容来取得一些使用样例。
-$t(vtxTablePowerLevelsLabel.message):您可以在此为您的图传的每个功率级别都设置标签。可以是数字(25, 200, 600, 1.2), 字母(OFF, MIN, MAX) 或者是数字与字母混用。

你必须仅配置符合当地法律法规的功率级别。
vtxTablePowerLevelsTableHelp.english:
This table represents the different values of power that can be used for the VTX. They are divided into two:
- $t(vtxTablePowerLevelsValue.message): each power level requires a value that is defined by the hardware manufacturer. Ask your manufacturer for the correct value or consult the Betaflight wiki of VTX Tables to grab some samples.
- $t(vtxTablePowerLevelsLabel.message): you can put here the label you want for each power level value. It can be numbers (25, 200, 600, 1.2), letters (OFF, MIN, MAX) or a mix of them.

You must configure only the power levels that are legal at your country.
vtxTablePowerLevelsTableHelp.description: Help for the table of power levels (value-label) that appears in the VTX tab

vtxTablePowerLevelsValue.description: Text of one of the fields of the VTX Table element in the VTX tab

vtxTablePowerLevelsLabel.description: Text of one of the fields of the VTX Table element in the VTX tab

vtxTableChannels.description: Text of one of the fields of the VTX Table element in the VTX tab

vtxTableBandsChannelsHelp.message: 这里定义你希望图传用到的频段数量和频道数量。
vtxTableBandsChannelsHelp.english: This defines the number of bands and the number of channels by band that you want for your VTX.
vtxTableBandsChannelsHelp.description: Help for the number of bands and channels field of the VTX Table element in the VTX tab

vtxTableBandTitleName.description: Text of one of the titles of the VTX Table element in the VTX tab

vtxTableBandTitleLetter.description: Text of one of the titles of the VTX Table element in the VTX tab

vtxTableBandTitleFactory.description: Text of one of the titles of the VTX Table element in the VTX tab

vtxTableBandsChannelsTableHelp.message:
该表表示可用于图传的所有频率。 您可以拥有多个频段并且您必须配置每个频段的：
- $t(vtxTableBandTitleName.message)： 您需要为此频段分配名称，例如BOSCAM_A、FATSHARK 或 RACEDAND。
- $t(vtxTableBandTitleLetter.message): 该频段的缩写。
- $t(vtxTableBandTitleFactory.message): 这指示它是否是工厂模式频段。 如果启用，Betaflight会将频段及频道号码发送到图传。 图传将使用内置频率表，在此配置的频率值仅在OSD 内和其他地方显示。 如果不启用，Betaflight将向图传发送在此配置的真正的频率值。
- 频率： 此波段频率。

记住，并非所有频率在您的国家都是合法的。 您必须将不使用的频率上的值设置为 0。
vtxTableBandsChannelsTableHelp.english:
This table represents all the frequencies that can be used for your VTX. You can have several bands and for each band you must configure:
- $t(vtxTableBandTitleName.message): Name that you want to assign to this band, like BOSCAM_A, FATSHARK or RACEBAND.
- $t(vtxTableBandTitleLetter.message): Short letter that references the band.
- $t(vtxTableBandTitleFactory.message): This indicates if it is a factory band. If enabled Betaflight sends to the VTX a band and channel number. The VTX will then use its built-in frequency table and the frequencies configured here are only to show the value in the OSD and other places. If it is not enabled, then Betaflight will send to the VTX the real frequency configured here.
- Frequencies: Frequencies for this band.

Remember that not all frequencies are legal at your country. You must put a value of zero to each frequency index that you are not allowed to use to disable it.
vtxTableBandsChannelsTableHelp.description: Help for the table of bands-channels that appears in the VTX tab

configurationPidProcessDenomHelp.message: PID 循环的最高频率受 CPU 处理能力的限制。在所选循环速度下，CPU 负载不应超过 70%。
configurationPidProcessDenomHelp.english: The maximum frequency for the PID loop is limited by the CPU processing power. The CPU Load should not exceed 70% with the selected loop speed.

configurationGyroUse32kHzHelp.message: 仅当陀螺仪芯片支持时才能启用 32khz 采样频率。（目前有通过 SPI 总线连接的 MPU6500、MPU9250 和 ICM20xxx 系列）。如不能确定请查询你的飞控板资料。
configurationGyroUse32kHzHelp.english: 32 kHz gyro update frequency is only possible if the gyro chip supports it (currently MPU6500, MPU9250, and ICM20xxx if connected over SPI). If in doubt, consult the specification for your board.

configurationAccHardwareHelp.message: 启用加速计。所有稳定模式都需要此功能：自稳，半自稳，手动以及救机功能。
configurationAccHardwareHelp.english: Enables the Accelerometer. This is required for all stabilisation modes: Angle, Horizon, Acro Trainer and Rescue.

configurationBaroHardwareHelp.message: 启用气压计（如果可用）。飞行控制中目前不使用高度。它仅供参考，可通过遥测功能获得。
configurationBaroHardwareHelp.english: Enables the Barometer (if available). Altitude is currently not used in Flight Control. It is informative only, available via the Telemetry.

configurationMagHardwareHelp.message: 启用磁力计（如果可用）。飞行控制中目前不使用指南针方向。它仅供参考，可通过遥测功能获得。
configurationMagHardwareHelp.english: Enables the Magnetometer (if available). Compass direction is currently not used in Flight Control. It is informative only, available via the Telemetry.

blackboxModeHelp.message:
关：关闭日志。
正常：同时解锁和打开黑盒子开关时记录日志。
已解锁：在解锁时记录日志。
开关：在打开黑盒子开关时记录日志。
blackboxModeHelp.english:
OFF: Disables logging.
NORMAL: logging when both ARMED and BLACKBOX switch active.
ARMED: logging when ARMED.
SWITCH: logging when BLACKBOX switch active

blackboxDeviceHelp.message:
无日志:禁用日志记录。
板载闪存:允许记录到板载闪存芯片(如果可用)。
SD卡:记录到板载SD卡(如果可用)。
串行端口:记录到连接到串行端口的外部记录器设备(例如Open Lager)。串行端口必须在 串行端口选项卡的“外设”部分配置为“黑匣子日志”。
blackboxDeviceHelp.english:
No Logging: Disables logging.
Onboard Flash: Enables logging to onboard flash chip (if available).
SD Card: Log to onboard SD card (if available).
Serial Port: Log to an external logger device (e.g Open Lager) connected to a serial port. The serial port will have to be configured to 'Blackbox Logging' in the 'peripherals' section on the Serial Ports tab.

blackboxRateOfLoggingHelp.message: 记录数据将以此速度保存到记录设备中。如果要记录到外部设备，可能需要降低速度。
blackboxRateOfLoggingHelp.english: The log data is saved to the log device with this rate. For logging to an external device, lower speed may be required.

blackboxDebugModeHelp.message: 选择要记录的 额外 数据。如果启用，日志条目中将添加八个额外的调试项。
blackboxDebugModeHelp.english: Choose what extra data is being logged. If enabled, eight extra debug items are added to the log entries.

blackboxDebugAxisHelp.message: 选择调试的轴向，适用于某些调试模式
blackboxDebugAxisHelp.english: Choose which axis is being debugged. Applies to some of the debug modes.

blackboxSerialLogger.message: 外接串口日志记录设备

blackboxMscNote.message: 重新启动进入 大容量存储设备 (MSC) 模式。一旦激活, 您的飞行控制器上的板载闪存或 SD 卡将被计算机识别为存储设备, 并允许您下载日志文件。要退出此模式，请在电脑上执行弹出操作，并给飞控重新上电。
blackboxMscNote.english: Reboot into mass storage device (MSC) mode. Once activated, the onboard flash or SD card on your flight controller will be recognised as a storage device by your computer, and allow you to download your log files. Eject and power cycle your flight controller to leave mass storage device mode.
